metadata.title: CVE-2017-3331

platform: SUSE Linux Enterprise Module for Package Hub 15 SP4
SUSE Linux Enterprise Module for Package Hub 15 SP5

metadata.description: Vulnerability in the MySQL Server component of Oracle MySQL (subcomponent: Server: DML). The supported version that is affected is 5.7.11 to 5.7.17. Easily "exploitable" vulnerability allows low privileged attacker with network access via multiple protocols to compromise MySQL Server. Successful attacks of this vulnerability can result in unauthorized ability to cause a hang or frequently repeatable crash (complete DOS) of MySQL Server. CVSS 3.0 Base Score 6.5 (Availability impacts). CVSS Vector: (CVSS:3.0/AV:N/AC:L/PR:L/UI:N/S:U/C:N/I:N/A:H).

criterions.comment: SUSE Linux Enterprise Module for Package Hub 15 SP4 is installed
SUSE Linux Enterprise Module for Package Hub 15 SP5 is installed
